1.20.1.1.096: this fixes a bug with block braking
1.20.1.1.095: this adds a Stone sifter block(random output of 6 items), fixes grinderhead not braking in blocks, fixes missing crafting for debrias
1.20.1.1.094: this fixes bugs with the GUI's for liquid levels. this also makes it so you need Blaze rods in the netherite crafter
1.20.1.1.093: this adds a netherite Crafting block, this is a one scrap one Gold ingot crafting set up just takes time
1.20.1.1.092: replaces the Block directional inputs and outputs, more like how they used to be. code overhal.
1.20.1.1.091: This fixes a bug that i created when adding block progresses. this bug shared the values between blocks this would make it if you had more then one block they would glitch out
1.20.1.1.089: Adds JEI suprot for the Grinder block, also fixes a bug with Chiller progress bar. also adds JEI tool tips on the Chilling blocks/Items
1.20.1.1.088: updated the way GUI's render there progress or levels, this was done to reduce space as the mod used alot of files.
1.20.1.1.086: Fixes BlockFactory BlockState(finally), adds GUI Titles to blocks, also Tool Tips on the inputslots.
1.20.1.1.085: Fixes bug with Raw Iron in the grinder. tags added for dusts/ingots. added debri ore to the grinder, also made it so only the correct items will go into correct slots of GUI's
1.20.1.1.084: Adds copper dust, and all process's for it. also added deepslate ore's to the manual process
1.20.1.1.082: fixes chiller block bucket removal, adds auto update checker.
1.20.1.1.080: Fixed an issue animation of block and fixes many blocks issues inside of the gui.
1.20.1.1.078: adds progress bars to all blocks, adds a chiller that gives you 10x ice per bucket of water.

1.20.1.1.070: Added a Grinder block for doubling ores
